text: Eghtɨ ingangarir kam mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨtɨ en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bar gavgavightɨ bizir kam e damutɨ e bar moghɨra navir vamɨra ikiamin arazim inigh, egh e Godɨn Otarim guizbangɨra bar a gɨfogham. Kamaghɨn damightɨ e Kraisɨn gɨn zuir darorir kamɨn aven, e tugh gavgavighɨva aghung mangɨ, gumazir aruabar avaghɨva egh e guizbangɨra Kraisɨn mɨn otogham.
